name: PulseWallet
tag_list: payments, biometrics, cloud, security, wallet, financial, easy, credit-card, coupons
overview:
PulseWallet is a revolutionary virtual wallet that lets you pay for products and services with just your finger.

We’re aiming to make checks, credit cards, wallets, and paper receipts obsolete. It’s about time our society advanced beyond these primitive transaction methods.

We provide terminals to merchants that will allow consumers and buyer to make physical wallets, virtual. Stored securely in the cloud. It has 3 easy steps.

Enroll at any terminal or kiosk. Enrolling is quick and can be done after any purchase, just follow on-screen instructions after a regular purchase and verify your account online.

Add payment methods to your account. Add any credit card, debit card, or bank account through your account online. You can also add loyalty cards and coupons!

Place your finger and go!You’re all set! Just go back to any participating store and leave your wallet behind. It’s really that simple!
